LEO PRIME stood calmly as some made suggestions about different
poss=
ible ways to go.

TUCSON suggested that task should be done in stages. In l=
ine with that
UPROAR suggested a decoy team and RAT TRAP talked of a recon =
team. At
the same time  STRAIGHT SHOT  was thinking about a weapons assault=

team and QUICKSTRIDE was thinking of a field advance team.

LEO PRIME turn=
ed as WINDLORD spoke of Insulating the Ark and even
removing the Predacons =
by brute force. He said nothing as KUP came
back with the fact that that wa=
sn=92t the Maximal=92s style. For the
moment he let the comments come, even=
 the one from TALON about
removing every piece of evidence of their presenc=
e.

=93We do not know if the Nemesis would have to be removed, but the rest=
,
the other additions that we have made to this planet would need to be
rem=
oved, yes.=94

And then WHEELIE walked in . . .

LEO PRIME=92s face darkene=
d somewhat, whether this was fear, chagrin,
surprise or a crazed mergance o=
f the three it was difficult to tell.
This particular expression was mirror=
ed to a lesser degree by TORCA,
NOCTORRO and WINGSABER, but they each said =
nothing as they just looked
at LEO.

During LEO PRIME=92s pause, WHEELIE=92=
s particular charm makes it though
the ranks of the Maximals, some of which=
 causes some of them to try to
leave.

LEO paused and nodded to WHEELIE, =
=93Welcome . . . Wheelie . . . didn=92t
we . .  uh . . . =94 He said after =
a stuttered pause. He seemed like he
was going to say something more to him=
, perhaps about the fact that he
was suppose to be at the shuttle guarding =
it . . . locked in securely.
but then as if he remembered he was up in fron=
t of a full meeting
returned his attention to the crowd at large.

=93Mech=
=92s and Femmes.=94 He said, his voice resuming a measure of
professionalis=
m. =93You have all given many different ideas and
suggestions, but there ar=
e also things for us to think about.=94

He took a moment to look at the di=
fferent ones present an inviting
smile curving upon his lips, =93However do=
es anyone know just where the
Unicronians are yet?=94 LEO turned to look at=
 the others in the room,
=93Or what are their current goals and strategies?=
=94 There was no anger
or a putting of anyone down as he spoke, just helpin=
g them to see
points. =93Does anyone know who even is in charge of their pe=
ople, or
even how many of them are on Earth?=94

He turned to a different g=
roup, =93What about the Predacons. They are
criminals. But I don=92t think =
even =96they- would want to endanger their
future.=94 LEO PRIME gestured at=
 the door of the ARK, =93Remember during
the battle, Hydras commanded that =
Optimus Prime and Megatron not be
hurt or hit. Perhaps he can be reasoned w=
ith.=94

LEO PRIME turned to the audience to see what their reaction would =
be
to his suggestions. LEO was not commanding this, but looking for a
respo=
nse.
